text: The LKL All-Star Game Most Valuable Player (MVP) Award, is an annual professional Lithuanian Basketball League (LKL) award, that is given to the player(s) that are voted to be the best of the league's annual All-Star Game. ==Winners== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Year !! Player !! Nationality !! Team |- !colspan="4" style="background:#dcdcdc; text-align:center"| All-Star Game |- | 1995 | Saulius Štombergas & Patrick Jones | & | LSU-Atletas & Olimpas |- | 1996 | Rimas Kurtinaitis | | Žalgiris |- | 2000 | Mindaugas Timinskas | | Žalgiris |- | 2001 | Grigorij Chizniak | | Žalgiris |- | 2002 | Robertas Javtokas | | Lietuvos Rytas |- | 2003 | Arvydas Macijauskas | | Lietuvos Rytas |- | 2004 | Tanoka Beard | | Žalgiris |- | 2005 | Tanoka Beard (2×) | | Žalgiris |- | 2006 | Simas Jasaitis | | Lietuvos Rytas |- | 2007 | Kareem Rush & Jonas Mačiulis | & | Lietuvos Rytas & Žalgiris |- | 2008 | Hollis Price | | Lietuvos Rytas |- | 2009 | Chuck Eidson | | Lietuvos Rytas |- | 2010 | Mindaugas Kuzminskas | | Šiauliai |- | 2011 | Jonas Valančiūnas | | Lietuvos Rytas |- | 2012 | Jonas Valančiūnas (2×) | | Lietuvos Rytas |- | 2013 | Kšyštof Lavrinovič & Darjuš Lavrinovič | | Žalgiris |- | 2014 | Justin Dentmon | | Žalgiris |- | 2015 | Travis Leslie | | Lietuvos Rytas |- !colspan="4" style="background:#dcdcdc; text-align:center"| King Mindaugas Cup |- | 2016 | Antanas Kavaliauskas | | Lietuvos Rytas |- | 2017 | Edgaras Ulanovas | | Žalgiris |} ==See also== *LKL All-Star Game *LKL All-Star Day *LKL Three-point Shootout *LKL Slam Dunk Contest == External links == * Official LKL website * Official LKL YouTube.com channel * Lithuanian league at Eurobasket.com All-Star
title: LKL All-Star Game Most Valuable Player Award
